item.title: How To Make Fighting Un-Tele-Able
item.dc:creator: @hasumon hasumon
item.description:
@hasumon wrote:

It will be similar to this } else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("home")) { if (teleblock == true) { sendMessage("A magical force stops you from teleporting."); else if (inCombat == true) { sendMessage("Your in combat! You can't tele away from a fight!"); } else { teleportToX = 3284; teleportToY = 3034; heightLevel = 0; sendMessage("You teleport Home."); } }

IDK i just made this up but hey i think it will work due to my neatness
